DataElement.preferredName: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Adult Version Task Monitor Scale Raw Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function-Adult Version - Task Monitor Scale Raw Score.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Adult Version Task Monitor Scale Raw Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized measure that assesses the executive functions of adults aged 18-90 years in their everyday environment. Both a self-report and an informant report are used._A rating scale included in the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function (BRIEF) that reflects the ability to keep track of one's problem-solving success or failure, and to identify and correct mistakes during performance of a goal._A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized measure that assesses the executive functions of adults aged 18-90 years in their everyday environment. Both a self-report and an informant report are used.

Property.preferredDefinition: A rating scale included in the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function (BRIEF) that reflects the ability to keep track of one's problem-solving success or failure, and to identify and correct mistakes during performance of a goal.:A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

Concepts.definition: A rating scale included in the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function (BRIEF) that reflects the ability to keep track of one's problem-solving success or failure, and to identify and correct mistakes during performance of a goal.
A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of an individual score into a standard form made without knowledge of the population standard deviation and mean for the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function.
